description: Coordinates 4 specialized sub-agents for PE due diligence and synthesizes consolidated analysis with risk scores and recommendations

result.executive_summary: The target company demonstrates moderate liquidity concerns and declining operational efficiency. While sustainability metrics show some one-time revenue items, the overall business model appears viable with proper working capital management.
key_findings: Working capital declined 15% year-over-year, indicating potential cash flow stress
Gross margins compressed by 3% due to rising input costs without pricing power
One-time consulting revenue of $2M masks underlying 8% decline in recurring revenue

cross_referenced_insights.consolidated_insight: Both agents identified deteriorating working capital metrics. Days Sales Outstanding increased from 45 to 62 days while Days Payable Outstanding decreased, creating a cash conversion cycle squeeze.
Sustainability agent flagged one-time revenue items totaling $2M. Auditor lens confirmed these are non-recurring consulting contracts with insufficient disclosure in management presentations.

prioritized_risks.description: Working capital declined 15% YoY with cash conversion cycle extending from 30 to 48 days
prioritized_risks.impact: Could require $3-5M additional working capital injection within 6 months post-acquisition
prioritized_risks.mitigation: Negotiate vendor payment terms, implement AR collection acceleration, establish $5M working capital line of credit

prioritized_risks.description: One-time revenue of $2M (8% of total) masks declining recurring revenue trends
prioritized_risks.impact: Actual normalized EBITDA is 12% lower than presented, affecting valuation and debt capacity
prioritized_risks.mitigation: Rebase financial projections excluding one-time items, adjust purchase price or earn-out structure

prioritized_risks.description: Gross margin compression of 3% over 18 months due to input cost inflation
prioritized_risks.impact: Projected EBITDA may miss plan by 8-10% if pricing power cannot be improved
prioritized_risks.mitigation: Develop detailed 100-day pricing strategy, evaluate procurement optimization opportunities

action_items: Commission detailed working capital analysis with monthly cash flow forecast for next 12 months
Request breakdown of all one-time/non-recurring revenue items for past 3 years
Conduct customer interviews to validate pricing power and competitive positioning
Review all vendor contracts for payment term renegotiation opportunities

liquidity_risk.key_finding: Working capital declined 15% with concerning cash conversion cycle extension

operational_efficiency.key_finding: Gross margins under pressure from input costs without offsetting pricing improvements

sustainability.key_finding: One-time revenue items total $2M, masking 8% decline in core recurring revenue

external_auditor.key_finding: Insufficient disclosure of revenue quality issues in management presentations

test_message_used: Analyze the uploaded PE deal documents for comprehensive due diligence
test_error: Schema manually defined based on agent instructions
custom_fields_note: This schema reflects the specific structure designed for PE due diligence analysis with cross-referenced insights and risk prioritization
